ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Back to good stuff, LOOT! and Levels!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... BUMP ! Tim. AND you have to figure in that Chant of Battle is a Drum song that at my level 48 is giving a plus 37 STR and plus 34 AC ! I just tested it
ygData.messageBody:
Tim Burke wrote:
> Many times the tanks in my group like the dex and str that come from...
> chant of battle! That's right, the lvl 1 song with the tamborine -
> especially with procing weapons - they start counting how many times the
> weapons go off! So I usually will do the tried and true, CoB, Celerity, and
> largo's or Niv's a tank heavy group.

"BUMP !" Tim. AND you have to figure in that Chant of Battle is a Drum
song that at my level 48 is giving a plus 37 STR and plus 34 AC ! I just
tested it with my Nostrolo. Tambourine. I am not a instrument switcher
in the heat of battle so Berserker's only gives them 17 STR and 16 AC.
What I love with is it combines with #47 Niv's to give a combined STR of
around 50 STR :)

But your right about one thing. I is really hard now to figure out what
to sing. Last night in the Dead Captain room in Karnor's I good bored
buffing the Monk and Pally and decided to go all offensive with my 3
Chant songs. I didn't say anything but after a couple of crits "died"
quietly our Group leader said "I don't know what yer doing Moonie but
what ever it is KEEP IT UP !" ..hehe, I should have said "You want mana
in battle too now ?"

Moonflower Bllue,
48th Bard of Cazic-Thule
